paragraphs.body: The snow leopard caribou exhibits a combination of both classic feline and cervid morphology. More specifically, the creature bears a large resemblance to the snow leopard in terms of general build and dietary adaptations, while bearing a resemblance to the caribou in terms of size and locomotive adaptations.
